about_the_game:
This is the story of Cathy.

She is very catty and always wants to look pretty, but she always says mean things. When she walks she poops and it may turn to gold. She needs the gold to buy fillers for her face to look pretty. If you do not click on the poop and make it gold, her face will shrivel up and she will not be pretty.

Let's help Cathy look pretty or maybe not!

Use your mouse to tap on Cathy, poop to collect prizes, and tapping on vehicles will release food which makes her poop faster.

On the steam deck tap on the screen just like you would with a mouse.

Y - Use Botox
X - Power up 1
A - Power up 2
B - Power up 3
detailed_description:
Tips

Bonus: Every 10 levels your bonus increases. When poop turns to gold there is a change to give a special item Helpers: They help collect poop and reward bonus items


About the Game

This is the story of Cathy. She is very catty and always wants to look pretty, but she always says mean things. When she walks she poops and it may turn to gold. She needs the gold to buy fillers for her face to look pretty. If you do not click on the poop and make it gold, her face will shrivel up and she will not be pretty. Let's help Cathy look pretty or maybe not! Use your mouse to tap on Cathy, poop to collect prizes, and tapping on vehicles will release food which makes her poop faster. On the steam deck tap on the screen just like you would with a mouse. Y - Use Botox X - Power up 1 A - Power up 2 B - Power up 3

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: i3 Processor
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card that supports shaders
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports basic sound

name: Catty Cathy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card that supports shaders
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports basic sound
